thread.title: Country star Willie Nelson cancels, reschedules shows due to illness
thread.title_full: Country star Willie Nelson cancels, reschedules shows due to illness

author: News Staff
title: Country star Willie Nelson cancels, reschedules shows due to illness
text:
Posted Oct 15, 2015 1:08 pm MDT Last Updated Oct 15, 2015 at 1:54 pm MDT FILE - In this Sept. 19, 2015 file photo, Willie Nelson performs at Farm Aid 30 in Chicago. Nelson has rescheduled two shows and canceled another due to an unspecified health issue. Nelson and Merle Haggard were scheduled to perform on Thursday, Oct. 15, and Friday, but the South Carolina and Virginia dates were rescheduled and a show in Reading, Pennsylvania on Saturday was canceled. (Photo by Rob Grabowski/Invision/AP, File) 
NASHVILLE, Tenn. – Country star Willie Nelson has rescheduled two shows and cancelled another due to an unspecified health issue. 
Nelson and Merle Haggard were scheduled to perform Thursday and Friday, but South Carolina and Virginia dates were rescheduled and a show in Reading, Pennsylvania, on Saturday was cancelled. 
A statement on his Facebook page said the 82-year-old Nelson was feeling under the weather. His publicist said the tour is scheduled to resume on Sunday, Oct. 18, at the American Roots Music Festival in Raleigh, North Carolina. 
The two country icons are touring together after releasing a duets album earlier this year called “Django and Jimmie.” 
___
